title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:
ain story, you will eventually find yourself at the Moonrise Towers where you will subsequently begin the main quest: Infiltrate Moonrise Towers.

We reached Moonrise Towers. It seems unlikely that a high-value asset like Grand Duke Ravengard would be confined with other prisoners; the deeper we delve into the towers, the closer we'll be to finding him.

Move through this location and you will only be able to see the Grand Duke from a cutscene when you enter the Mind Flayer Colony past the Barra
